title: 'Sharknado' Part Deux: The Laughably Bad Epic Strikes Back
teaser: Syfy channel has cornered the market on a new kind of film: a movie that's played completely straight, but constructed to look cheesy and easy to ridicule. The best example? Sharknado 2, the sequel to a film so bad it became huge success. Can the network strike gold twice by being stupid on purpose?
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
